I'll take your order in a few moments./faceDirection Gus 2/move Emily 2 0 1/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/pause 800/move Emily -2 0 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Clint 3 true/move Emily 2 0 1/warp Elliott 14 24/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Elliott 0 -3 3/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move Elliott -2 0 0/move Elliott 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Elliott 3/Hello, @! What a pleasant surprise! I was just stopping in to relax after an eight hour writing session./pause 400/faceDirection Elliott 1/Bartender! Two of your finest ales, please! Bartender! Fetch me your finest ale. And bring some wine for the lady!/faceDirection Gus 3/faceDirection farmer 0/.../move Gus 3 0 0/move Gus 0 -1 0/faceDirection Emily 2/playSound openBox/pause 400/playSound Milking/move Pam -6 0 0/move Gus 0 1 3/move Gus -5 0 2/faceDirection Elliott 0/pause 500/There you go, sir./pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 3/faceDirection farmer 1/Wait. I propose a toast! To.../faceDirection Elliott 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 900/showFrame Elliott 16/animate Elliott false false 120 16 17 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 17 16/pause 500/farmerEat 346/pause 900/pause 1100/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/*Hic*... Strong stuff.../pause 800/animate Elliott false false 400 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 16/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/stopAnimation farmer/end warpOut" 96/f Gus 1000/f Pam 500/p Gus: "jaunty/10 21/farmer -100 -100 0 Gus 10 21 2 Pam -101 -101 0/skippable/pause 200/emote Gus 28/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 14 24/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1 true/move farmer 0 -3 3/Oh, Hello there, buddy. Hi, @./pause 500/faceDirection Gus 2/move farmer -3 0 2/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 700/*sigh*...I'm just looking over last month's earnings... and It's not looking very good, @. The worst thing... and I hate to say this because she's my friend... is Pam! She hasn't paid off her tab in weeks! ...But I can't ask her to do it. I know she'll get defensive, and I don't want to hurt her feelings./pause 600/faceDirection Gus 1/@, you gotta help me!/stopMusic/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Pam 14 24/move Pam 0 -3 3/faceDirection Gus 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Gus 16/Hiya! Gus... I'm awful thirsty, if you catch my drift./emote Gus 28/Er... Well, okay Pam./emote Gus 28/pause 700/emote Pam 8/pause 400/@, what's going on here?/pause 400/faceDirection Pam 1/emote Pam 12/.... *sigh* ...Well, I guess I'd better pay off that tab, then./move Pam -2 0 0/move Pam 0 -1 3/move Pam -2 0 2/faceDirection Gus 0/faceDirection farmer 3/playSound money/pause 500/Thanks, Pam!/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1/And thank you, @./pause 500/faceDirection Gus 0/Now, let's get you that drink, Pam./friendship Gus 50/Thanks for your help, @. This cash is going to be a big help to the saloon." 97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun: "none/4 18/farmer 14 24 0 Clint 4 19 2 Emily 10 11 0 Gus 15 18 1 Shane 7 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 3/emote Clint 28/pause 500/move Clint 0 -1 3/move Clint -3 0 0/pause 500/playSound openBox/pause 150/playSound shiny4/pause 400/playMusic desolate/move Clint 3 0 2/move Clint 0 1 2/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3/faceDirection Shane 2 true/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Shane 1 true/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Clint 1/Hello, @... care to join me?/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Clint 2/Let me just go ahead and tell you what's on my mind. I have terrible luck with women, @...*sigh* I'm a nice guy if you get to know me, I swear!/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/The girls all seem to like you, @... You're a girl, @.../Got any tips? What advice can you give me?/speed Emily 4/move Emily -6 0 2/speed Emily 2/move Emily 0 4 2/doAction 4 16/playSound openBox/stopMusic/move Emily 0 3 1/move Emily 1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 3/pause 400/pause 700/Hi Clint, what can I get for you tonight?/pause 600/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 200/Yes!/pause 300/Er.. I mean, I'll have the Big n' Cheesy. With extra sauce, please. .../faceDirection Clint 3/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 2/Hi @./pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Clint 1/Er... *ahem* Th...Thanks, Emily. For... taking my order. Um, Emily? I was...*gulp*... I was wondering.../pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/emote Emily 8/pause 400/Yes, Clint?/pause 500/emote Clint 28/pause 1200/... nevermind./faceDirection Clint 0/playMusic sadpiano/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 1/move Emily 1 0 1/faceDirection Shane 3/Hi, Shane! Here's your beverage./pause 300/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 400/addObject 8 17 346 1/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 1/Thanks, Emily! So... How's your shift coming along?/It's fine! Thanks for asking, Shane! Do you have any new chicken stories for me?/pause 600/emote Clint 28/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 800/*sigh* I'm doomed.../end warpOut" 911526/f Alex 2500/t 1900 2200/n joshMessage: "gusviolin/-1000 -1000/farmer 5 5 1 Gus 10 6 2 Alex 9 5 3 Emily 9 17 2/skippable/showFrame 117/showFrame Alex 39/positionOffset farmer 12 8/positionOffset Alex -12 0/animate Gus false true 723 16 17/viewport 7 4 true/pause 23000/stopAnimation Gus/pause 1000/faceDirection Gus 3/Thanks, Gus. That was great./move Gus 0 1 1/move Gus 1 0 2/move Gus 0 1 2/doAction 11 9/move Gus 0 3 1/move Gus 12 0 3 true/This is nice... I've never dined in here before./pause 1000/emote Alex 40/Um, anyway... I reserved this private room so we could talk.../warp Emily 11 11 true/playSound woodyStep/move Emily 0 -4 3/move Emily -4 0 0/move Emily 0 -1 0/I've got a linguini with mushroom cream sauce for Mr. @. I've got a kale and walnut salad for the lady. ...and a grilled steak for Alex. And a grilled steak for the gentleman./playSound woodyHit/specificTemporarySprite joshDinner/Thanks./move Emily 4 0 2/move Emily 0 5 1/move Emily 11 0 1 true/So, what I wanted to say was.../playMusic musicboxsong/*gulp*/pause 600/Well... when we first met, I was instantly drawn to you. It was confusing... I'd never felt that way about anyone. When I first met you, I thought you were really cute. I kept telling myself 'You can't have these kinds of feelings for another guy'. Normally, when I have a crush on someone, the feeling goes away pretty quick.../pause 800/...But my heart was telling me something else. ...But with you, it kept growing./pause 400/emote Alex 40/pause 600/question fork1 \"#I feel the same way.#I'm sorry... I don't feel that way about you.\"/pause 400/fork rejectJosh/... I can't believe it took this long to say that to each other./emote Alex 32/pause 800/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 400/Mmm... this steak is outstanding. Can you smell that fragrant sauce?/eyes 1 -4000/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite alexDiningDog/playSound dogWhining/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 6000/..." rejectJosh: "pause 100/playMusic none/shake Alex 2000/emote Alex 28/...Oh... I...I'm sorry if I made you uncomfortable.../pause 2000/I'm not hungry anymore.../viewport move 1 1 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 4000/..." 195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/i 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 1000/message \"For some reason, you decide to place your hand in your pocket...\"/pause 500/message \"You touch the rabbit's foot, and feel a sense of relief...\"/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/Hey!/What's up?/Oh, hey/pause 2000/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/You showed up just in time for the first ever Pelican Town 8-ball tournament!/pause 500/Don't worry, I've never played before, either./pause 500/It's easy, you just gotta put some mustard on the cue ball.../pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message \"You played a round of pool with the boys.\"/pause 1000/message \"Sebastian won, of course... but it was still a lot of fun!\"/pause 500/end" 195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099: "playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 27 19 1 Sam 36 20 1 Sebastian 37 19 2 Harvey 39 19 2 Shane 40 17 2 Elliott 41 19 2 Alex 42 20 3/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/startJittering/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame farmer 0/stopJittering/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame farmer 7 true/startJittering/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/Not so fast!/Hold it!/Stop!/pause 3000/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 6 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 1/playMusic none/emote farmer 28/pause 500/Never thought you'd find all your 'boyfriends' in one room, huh @?/pause 500/You tricked all of us into thinking we loved you... @... I thought you wanted to get married and start a family with me... What did I do wrong?/pause 500/The last shred of hope I had left is completely destroyed... Thanks, @. Are you happy now?/pause 500/@? I thought... I thought we were 'one of a kind'... But you were just using me? What are you looking at *me* for? You think I'm gonna come to your rescue?/pause 500/For once, I'm at a loss for words... /pause 500/playMusic wedding/Well, we're not going to put up with your abuse any longer! We all know the truth, now! And we're not going to tolerate this!/That's right!/pause 500/Well? What do you have to say for yourself?/pause 1000/question fork1 \"#I'm sorry... what I did was wrong.#Guys, calm down! I can explain...\"/fork choseToExplain/pause 500/Sure.../pause 500/Nice try, but that's not going to cut it.../pause 1000/playMusic none/...so we've come to a decision... isn't that right, fellas?/pause 500/...yes./Absolutely./pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/We're all giving you the cold shoulder!/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 3/end warpOut" choseToExplain: "pause 100/I doubt it.../pause 500/resetVariable/question fork2 \"#You were all too pushy with me! You made it difficult to say 'no'!#Pierre pressured me! He wanted to sell more bouquets!#(Start crying)\"/pause 100/fork crying/Liar!/Yeah, right!/Don't blame others for your mistakes! You're just losing more respect with us.../pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/...I think we've come to a decision... isn't that right, boys?/pause 500/...yes./Absolutely./faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/We're all giving you the cold shoulder!/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut" crying: "pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/emote Harvey 12 true/emote Sebastian 12 true/emote Shane 12 true/emote Sam 12 true/emote Elliott 12 true/emote Alex 12 true/That's not going to work! You won't be preying on our sympathies this time!/I'll assume this is just another act... Typical.../pause 100/You need to take responsibility for what you've done.../pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/...I think we've come to a decision... isn't that right, boys?/pause 500/...yes./Absolutely./faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/We're all giving you the cold shoulder!/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut" wewereworried: "emote farmer 40/faceDirection Marnie 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 2/emote Shane 12/I'm your husband... you should trust me. I've always been honest with you about my problems. Look... I know I haven't been able to quit cold turkey... but, I'm trying my best... and I'm getting a lot healthier. My life is better now than it's ever been. I'm not in such a dark place anymore.../pause 500/emote Marnie 20 true/emote farmer 20 true/pause 1300/faceDirection Shane 0/You know, when I'm playing this game, I become so focused that I can't think about anything else. It really helps when I've got 'the urge'.../faceDirection Shane 2/Anyway... I'll just... eh... play ONE more round and head home. Okay?/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/You guys must have been really confused when you came in and saw me in front of the arcade machine!" 3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex: "distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/Big play!/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/Score!/pause 400/There we go!/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/Atta boy!/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/Hey, @! You made it!/faceDirection Alex 1/So... what do you think?/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/I've been thinking... You know how I used to dream of being an athlete someday? Well, my life ended up turning out a bit different... I'm happy, though, don't get me wrong! ...But I thought it would be cool to have a place where us guys could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room! This way, I get to keep part of 'the dream' alive, in a small way./pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!/faceDirection Alex 1/Thanks, Grandpa./pause 500/I'm happy for an excuse to get out of the house, and take my mind off things./faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/Same/pause 1200/I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business! Though maybe not so good for Shane's liver.../pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/Hey!/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message \"It seems the guys have a new Sunday tradition.\"/pause 1000/message \"5,000g well spent!\"/pause 1000/Thanks again for the money, @. It was a fun project for me, and all the guys seem happy with it!" 3206194/n gusGiantOmelet: "distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 02 Gus 10 21 2 Willy 13 21 3 Lewis 8 22 1 Robin 9 20 2 Pam 11 20 2 Marnie 9 23 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\\\Cursors2 145 193 32 28 10 20.75 8 .15/viewport 11 21 true/pause 3000/Well, folks... once again, we're gathered for a very special occasion./pause 500/...A rare visit from a very dear friend.../pause 500/jump Gus/pause 400/...My world-famous giant omelet! Zesty bell pepper, juicy tomato, rich mushroom, and tangy cheese... all enrobed in a blanket of rich, fluffy egg. Dig in, folks./move Marnie 1 0 0/move Willy -1 0 3/move Lewis 1 0 1/showFrame Lewis 28/playSound coin/showFrame Willy 32/showFrame Robin 37/showFrame Pam 36/pause 600/shake Lewis 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 600/playSound eat/pause 800/shake Robin 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 400/playSound eat/pause 700/faceDirection Gus 1/Willy? What do you think?/pause 400/Hmm.../pause 700/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/The mushrooms are a tad chewier than last year.../pause 400/Is that a good thing?/pause 400/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 1300/Aye, lad/pause 300/jump Gus/pause 400/emote Gus 32/pause 1000/It's great Gus. And it tastes even better because it's on the house!/faceDirection Gus 2/These eggs are so rich and yellow... Marnie, are these from your place?/faceDirection Gus 3/Nope... You can thank @ over at %farm Farm!/emote Lewis 20 true/emote Marnie 20 true/emote Robin 20 true/emote Pam 20 true/emote Willy 20 true/pause 1000/Mmmm... %farm eggs./pause 200/Mmph../faceDirection Gus 2/viewport move 1 0 7000/pause 500/playSound eat/shake Robin 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Lewis 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Marnie 400/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end"
